meeting_info.location: Dallas City Hall, L1FN Auditorium and Videoconference

agenda_items.title: Approval of the minutes for the October 8, 2024 City of Dallas Housing Finance Corporation Meeting
Action Item: Resolution for 2929 Wycliff
agenda_items.description: Consider and adopt partnership resolutions approving the form and substance of and authorizing the execution and delivery of documents and instruments necessary to carry out the financing and operation of 2929 Wycliff.

agenda_items.title: Action Item: Resolution for Waterford at Goldmark
agenda_items.description: Consider and adopt a financing resolution authorizing the issuance, sale and delivery of the City of Dallas Housing Finance Corporation Multifamily Housing Revenue Notes (Waterford at Goldmark) Series 2024.

agenda_items.title: Action Item: Resolution for The Hartford Living
agenda_items.description: Consider and adopt a resolution approving a Memorandum of Understanding with Blue Lofts, Inc. for the acquisition, financing, development and operation of The Hartford Living.

agenda_items.title: Action Item: Resolution for The Ridge at Loop 12
agenda_items.description: Consider and adopt a resolution approving a Memorandum of Understanding with LDG Multifamily, LLC for the acquisition, construction, financing, development and operation of The Ridge at Loop 12.

agenda_items.title: Action Item: Resolution to terminate the Memorandum of Understanding between the Corporation and Opportunity Housing Group, Inc.
Action Item: Resolution to terminate the Memorandum of Understanding between the Corporation and Jefferson at the Central, LLC
Discussion on Housing and Homelessness Solutions Committee Special Called Meeting
agenda_items.description: Discussion regarding operation and governance of the Corporation.

agenda_items.title: Review and discussion of DHFC Treasurer’s report
agenda_items.description: Review for the eight-month period ending on August 31, 2024.

agenda_items.title: Review and discussion of the Corporation’s pipeline report
